title: Hour 1 - RIP Tony Siragusa, Bad Call in the Stanley Cup Final
itunes:title: Hour 1 - RIP Tony Siragusa, Bad Call in the Stanley Cup Final
description:
Dan has some nice words to say about Tony Siragusa to commemorate his passing, and some not so nice words for the NHL officials who blew that call in last night's game 4 of the Stanley Cup Final.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
